<div class = "">
<h1 class="title mb-12">
About me
</h1>
<div class="md:flex gap-6 items-center">
    <div>
        <img class="rounded-2xl border border-gray-400 border-2 mb-12" src="/images/linkedinphoto.jpeg">
    </div>
    <div class="textspace">
        <p class="">
            Hi y'all! My name's <span class="highlight">Roosevelt</span> I'm a junior studying <span class="highlight">Computer Science</span> with an emphasis in games at the <span class="highlight">University of Southern California</span>.
        </p>
        <p class="">
            I primarily work with gameplay and tools programming, but am also experienced in level and systems design. I believe in gameplay-first design and am interested in facilitating collaboration between programmers and designers to develop tools and workflows that work for everyone.
        </p>
        <p class="">
            I've previously interned at <span class="highlight underline"><a href="https://rawthrills.com" target="_blank">Raw Thrills</a></span> where I worked in the arcade industry as a programmer and game designer. I have also previously been the programming lead at two game development groups at USC: Open Alpha and Rat Economy, the later of which I co-founded. I also served as game design lead on <span class="highlight underline"><a href="/projects/donuts" target="_blank">Donuts!</a></span>, a project made through USC's Advanced Games Project program.
        </p>
        <p class="">
            I'm currently hard at work on my next big project, stay tuned!
        </p>
    </div>
</div>
